content.en: Wireless power optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the performance of wireless power transfer systems. They have used various algorithms, such as the differential evolution algorithm, genetic algorithm, and gradient-based optimization algorithm, to optimize different aspects of these systems. By applying these algorithms, they aim to reduce power loss, improve transmission efficiency, and optimize the design of coils and relay systems.
content.da: Optimering af trådløs strøm: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre ydeevnen af trådløse strømoverførselssystemer. De har anvendt forskellige algoritmer, såsom differential evolution algoritme, genetisk algoritme og gradient-baseret optimeringsalgoritme, for at optimere forskellige aspekter af disse systemer. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter de mod at reducere strømtab, forbedre transmissionseffektiviteten og optimere designet af spoler og relæsystemer.
